statements: DELETE FROM space_mission_media WHERE mission_id IN (SELECT id FROM space_mission WHERE mission_name = 'Apollo 11');
DELETE FROM space_mission_videos WHERE mission_name = 'Mars Exploration';
DELETE FROM space_mission_images WHERE mission_name = 'Apollo 11' AND capture_date < '1969-07-20';
DELETE FROM space_mission_videos WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2020-12-31' AND duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
DELETE FROM Videos WHERE video_duration < 10.5 AND mission_id = 3;
DELETE FROM videos WHERE duration_minutes > 60 AND mission_id = 3;
